General.Name: Eltek Ltd
General.Description: Eltek Ltd. manufactures, markets, and sells printed circuit boards (PCBs) in Israel, Europe, North America, India, the Netherlands, and internationally. It offers a range of custom designed PCBs, including complex rigid, double-sided and multi-layer PCBs, and flexible circuitry boards. The company also provides backplanes, a high-density circuit boards; flexible and flex-rigid PCBs, and multi-layered boards, as well as act as a supplier for the importation of PCBs. Further, it offers teflon and hybrid boards, and eltek teflon fusion bonding; internal and external heat sinks, 3d heat sink, embedded passive component, heavy copper inner layer, etc.; technology road map; and HDI, as well as operates a resource center that includes white papers and magazines. In addition, it provides state-of-the-art training and consulting services. It primarily serves medical technology, defense and aerospace, industrial, telecom, networking equipment industries, and contract electronic manufacturers, as well as high speed digital and RF boards. The company markets and sells its products primarily through direct sales personnel, sales representatives, and PCB trading and manufacturing companies. Eltek Ltd. was incorporated in 1970 and is headquartered in Petah Tikva, Israel. Eltek Ltd. is a subsidiary of Nistec Golan Ltd.
General.Address: Sgoola Industrial Zone, Petah Tikva, Israel, 4927920
